title: Refrigerator Ice and Water Filter
description: Refrigerator Ice and Water Filter ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 105 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11701542 Manufacturer Part Number EDR1RXD1 The EDR1RXD1 water filter provides clean, fresh-tasting water by reducing contaminants such as lead, chlorine, and particulates. Designed for easy installation, this filter ensures your refrigerator water and ice are safe and refreshing with every use
symptoms: Ice maker dispenses too little ice

installationInstructions.author: James from Phelan, CA
installationInstructions.title: Old filter and water line to cold water line
installationInstructions.content: Cut a 1/4 inch off both lines and connect. Changed water filter. Found the water filter at Home Depot for 1/2 The price. Look befor you buy.
